snippet: Rupert Murdoch flew to London last month to boost morale at his British newspaper unit, rocked by revelations of phone-hacking and other alleged corrupt practices. But the news of two apparent suicide attempts at the top-telling Sun illustrates the...
abstract: Rupert Murdoch flew to London last month to boost morale at his British newspaper unit, rocked by revelations of phone-hacking and other alleged corrupt practices. But the news of two apparent suicide attempts at the top-telling Sun illustrates the levels of distress among its embattled journalists, employees tell Rendezvous.

headline.main: Fear and Loathing at Murdoch's Sun
